data.actual_result: Middle "emoji" is bold Systems Settings: Android 7.1.1 Discord 3.7.1
data.short_description: ":emoji:emoji:emoji:" bolds the middle "emoji" though when sent it doesn't show up as an emoji
data.steps_to_repro: - Type ":emoji:" - Put "emoji" in between - Put another ":emoji:" (using actual emoji names for all 3)
